attributes.long-description:
The zombie infection has turned into a worldwide pandemic. You find yourself in Louisiana and your survival chance starts by building a safe camp and becoming a skilled survivalist. Find water, food and shelter and talk to the unconventional locals to make your way around.
- Multiplayer: 4 can play simultaneously online or local.
- Randomized environments: from the unforgiving Mississippi Delta bayous to the abandoned streets of New Orleans.
- Character customization: choose and upgrade your skills as you level up and equip with scavenged and handcrafted armor, tools and weapons.
- A deep crafting system allows you to use items and materials to create hundreds of items, tools and weapons.
- Manage your hunger, thirst, energy and inventory weight.
- Set-up, upgrade and protect your camp with upgradeable traps, barricades and workshops.
- Night & day cycle and weather conditions.
- Lots of zombies and wildlife!
- Incredible fun with the gory finish moves and Kovac’s Video Survival Guide.

1-4 players
Network Players 2-4
DUALSHOCK®4
